content: knit on circular needles from the top-down this raglan sleeve sweater works up quickly and requires no seams using caron® x pantone™ yarn braids takes the guesswork out of choosing colors thanks to its expertly curated color palettes swapping the order of the colors can give you a completely different look too both machine washable and dryable this merino wool-blend yarn makes it a practical choice for a garment to fit bust measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3 xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5 xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust measurement xs/s 36 91 5 cm m 40 101 5 cm l 44 112 cm xl 48 122 cm 2/3 xl 56 142 cm 4/5 xl 64 162 5 cm
